name: Agribusiness Tamil - A Tamil Agriculture Podcast
description:
Agribusiness Tamil is a knowledge sharing & networking platform to connect fellow Agripreneur, Farmers, Farmer producer organizations, Agriculture and Environment enthusiasts, professionals and Students. Driven by the thirst to alleviate major issues in agriculture and allied activities by connecting the young and experienced energies
On the aim of building the strongest agricultural community by a set of Agri graduates.
Check out our works :
https://linktr.ee/Agribusinesstamil
